title: Anyone bought the Chromas?
body:
Are they worth?

(A$5.70) 590RP for 3 skins. I know its just recolours and literally takes Riot 5 secs to make but still.

I like the look of Yellucian.
https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTHKIIRWtQCpYYVn8N6nlcxg6LJ6C-AURNEaZW-8HMfLsZp0zo_

replies.body: Don't buy this crap, we need to show Riot that this shit isn't ok and to do that we need to not buy this shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Unseen Predator,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fAbdProw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-01T14:17:09.837+0000)
>
> Don't buy this crap, we need to show Riot that this shit isn't ok and to do that we need to not buy this shit.

Idiots want it and it's sad.

> [{quoted}](name=Unseen Predator,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fAbdProw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-01T14:17:09.837+0000)
>
> Don't buy this crap, we need to show Riot that this shit isn't ok and to do that we need to not buy this shit.

If you want it, buy it, if you don't want it, ignore it.

It should be a fairly simple concept, but do keep in mind that if you do buy it, they aren't skins, they are just re-colours, and you are paying a fair bit for a very low quality in game color change.
